mng: surname Lu, abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel, black, old variant of 廬|庐[lu2], (slang) (Tw) troublesome, fussy

exm.mng: Waterloo (Belgium), Battle of Waterloo (1815), fig. a defeat, failure
Lugou bridge or Marco Polo bridge in southwest of Beijing, the scene of the incident of 7th July 1937 that sparked WW2 between Japan and China
Le Louvre, Paris Museum, more common trad. form 羅浮宮|罗浮宫
